title: Integrated Mathematics Reasoning and Mathematics Register Education for Multilingual Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematical concepts comprehension and basic online learning tool utilization skills
context.additional_context: A course simultaneously supporting mathematical reasoning and specialized terminology acquisition through socially constructivist collaborative problem-solving activities

learning_goals: Learners will utilize key registers (terminology, symbols, argument structures) required for solving mathematical problems in multilingual contexts with 80% accuracy.
Learners will independently apply mathematical reasoning strategies at least three times during social interactions with peers via collaboration tools.

Learners will systematically apply step-by-step problem-solving heuristics (understanding the problem-planning-execution-reviewing) when solving open-ended math problems, achieving a correct answer rate of at least 70%.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
